resources.string:
We could not acquire root access on your device.

Most of this app's functions can be performed without root access. However, you might experience problems with running scripts or rebooting.

We strongly recommend to allow root access on next request or allow such access in your Su client manually.
File not found or root denied
For this action to take effect it is required to restart %1$s.\n\nPress OK to restart now
No backup found on this device
Would you like to create new backup now?

You have chosen to restore data from previous Rom Control preferences.

Please note! This operation will change your device settings based on the settings stored in this file.

DO NOT PROCEED unless absolutely sure!!!

Rom Control will close to allow data restoration and reopen again upon its completion. Depending on the amount of your settings this may take some time.

Please click "CONFIRM" to proceed or "CANCEL" to quit.
Backup completed successfully. The backup file can be found at\n%1$s
"Are you sure you want to run %1$s?"
For this action to take effect, full device reboot is required. Would you like to reboot now?
Your device will reboot IMMEDIATELY upon script completion!!!
This action will restore the following items to stock colors
Settings to enable and adjust dynamic statusbar
Automatically update background color of the status bar
Overlay a gradient on the status bar
Overlay a darkening filter on the status bar
The intensity of the darkening filter
Reboot Recovery toggle will be shown
Hot Reboot toggle will be shown
Change the background of the reboot menu
Change the pulldown background of the notification panel
Application to browse your files, including root files
Choose what app or shortcut to open when TW launcher is being swiped to the magazine page
Manage root permissions for apps and services
Check if there is an update for your rom
Check and install busybox to your phone
Change general settings related to the Pulldown Menu
Single swipe for Quickpanel on right side
Double tab to sleep on statusbar
Change QS Tiles to any number
Number of QS Tiles in portrait mode
Number of QS Tiles in landscape mode
Row QS Tiles in expanded pulldown
Number of QS row in portrait mode
Number of QS row in landscape mode
Column QS Tiles in expanded pulldown
Number of QS column in portrait mode
Number of QS column in landscape mode
Reboot visibility on top left corner
Show gif animation in notification pulldown
Link color from app and name
Customize SMusic QuickPanel and Lockscreen Buttons Colors + Text Colors
Different battery related settings can be changed here
Change Battery settings (only works when 3Minit battery enabled)
Set the Low Battery Warning Message Percentage
Set the Critical Battery Warning Message Percentage
SystemUI features which does not match any category
Turn on the torchlight by holding the volume up key while the screen is off
Allow the phone to rotate 360 degrees
Get the same NavBar color as the statusbar (as long the app does not force a color)
Allow navbar height to be edited
Ambient display will show when picked up
Ambient display will vibrate when picked up
If you enable this the display will wake up each time you receive a notification
Data Usage displayed on notification area
Enable or disable virtual lock buttons on statusbar
Global color will apply to all elements
All elements can be colored separately
Change behaviour of volume buttons while screen off
Wake your device with volume rocker
Settings related to Wifi and Signal icon
Choose custom signal icon for sim 2 (dual sim)
No Arrows for big wifi icons
Change settings related to weather on lockscreen
Settings of Hours, Minutes, Seconds and Date
Fingerprint unlock without waking the display first
Switch between S8 and S7 clock
Lock the pulldown menu on lockscreen
Randomize pin keypad (works only on stock theme)
Change settings related to hardware buttons
Remove killed from the recent bar
Change settings related to statusbar clock
Change Clock settings (only works when 3Minit clock enabled)
Chat with us about latest Rom stuff
Get latest Information about the Rom
Visit the official app on PlayStore to support us
New self-made website with forum function
